articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: American father and son plead guilty to helping former Nissan Chairman Ghosn flee Japan - Reuters
articles.description: A U.S. Special Forces veteran and his son pleaded guilty in Tokyo on Monday to charges that they illegally helped former Nissan Motor Co Ltd (7201.T) Chairman Carlos Ghosn flee Japan hidden in a box aboard a private jet in December 2019.
articles.content: A U.S. Special Forces veteran and his son pleaded guilty in Tokyo on Monday to charges that they illegally helped former Nissan Motor Co Ltd (7201.T) Chairman Carlos Ghosn flee Japan hidden in a box … [+2626 chars]

articles.author: Sporting News
articles.title: 'They know what a threat he is' - Southgate defends Kane after quiet game in England victory - Goal.com
articles.description: Lionel Messi says he doesn't believe that Argentina have ever been overly dependent on his contributions as he said the team is currently "on the right track" ahead of the Copa America.
